nodes.text: HoloNet News — A Galaxy Divided (Part 1) is a continuation of the in-universe HoloNet News podcast tying into the 2008 Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The installment takes place after the events of the season one finale "Hostage Crisis" and leads into the October 2, 2009 release of the Republic Heroes video game. It was written by Brooks Brown.
David W. Collins—Rule Davenbay (narrator), Salo, Perinko, Aren Bron
